name: prusti-assistant
description: Verify Rust programs with the Prusti verifier.

commands.title: verify the current crate or file

enumDescriptions: A fixed version of Prusti, specified via prustiTag.
A local build of Prusti, specified via localPrustiPath.
prusti-assistant.prustiVersion.description: Specifies from which version of Prusti should be used.

prusti-assistant.checkForUpdates.description: Specifies if Prusti should check for updates at startup.

prusti-assistant.localPrustiPath.description: Specifies the path to the local Prusti installation. This setting is only used if prustiVersion is set to Local.

prusti-assistant.prustiTag.description: Specifies the GitHub tag of the Prusti release to be used. Visit https://github.com/viperproject/prusti-dev/releases to see all the available tags. This setting is only used if prustiVersion is set to Tag.

prusti-assistant.verifyOnSave.description: Specifies if programs should be verified on save.

prusti-assistant.verifyOnOpen.description: Specifies if programs should be verified when opened.

prusti-assistant.reportErrorsOnly.description: Specifies if only error messages should be reported, hiding compiler's warnings.

prusti-assistant.javaHome.description: Specifies the path of the Java home folder (leave empty to auto-detect).

prusti-assistant.serverAddress.description: Specifies the address of a Prusti server to use for verification. If not set, the extension will start up and manage its own server.

prusti-assistant.extraPrustiEnv.description: Specifies additional environment variables to be passed to all Prusti runs. Remember to restart the Prusti Server after modifying this setting.

prusti-assistant.extraPrustiRustcArgs.description: Specifies additional arguments to be passed to Prusti-Rustc. Used when verifying a Rust file that is not part of a crate.

prusti-assistant.extraCargoPrustiArgs.description: Specifies additional arguments to be passed to Cargo-Prusti. Used when verifying a crate.

prusti-assistant.extraPrustiServerArgs.description: Specifies additional arguments to be passed to the Prusti Server. Remember to restart the Prusti Server after modifying this setting.
